Package Extbase\Utility

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Utility_Arrays The array functions from the good old t3lib_div plus new code.
Tx_Extbase_Utility_Extension Utilities to manage plugins and modules of an extension. Also useful to auto-generate the autoloader registry file ext_autoload.php.
Tx_Extbase_Utility_Plugin Utilities to manage the plugins of an extension
Tx_Extbase_Utility_TypoScript Utilities to manage and convert Typoscript Code
